channel.title: Html5 on Artsy Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Artsy Engineering

item.title: Responsive Layouts with CSS3
item.description: All of the SCSS stylesheets used to design this blog compile down to one file (view the source of this page and check out screen.css), and there isn’t any JavaScript affecting the layout. But there are really three versions of this page. If you’re reading this on a smartphone, what you see is almost entirely different from what you would see if you were reading this in a full screen browser.
